Package org.zaval.util

This is set of utilities classes that can be used for different purposes.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Validationable This interface allows to validate an object and provides ability to control validation state of the object.
 

Class Summary
MathBox This class provides set of useful math methods.
Timer This is timer component.
ValidationObject This abstract class is implementation of the Validationable interface that can be inherited with other classes.
 

Package org.zaval.util Description

This is set of utilities classes that can be used for different purposes.
